title: On Front Lines, Communication Breakdowns Prove Costly for Ukraine

title: 101-Year-Old Ex-Guard at Nazi Camp Is Convicted by German Court
abstract: The man, identified only as Josef S. because of German privacy laws, was sentenced to five years in prison after being found guilty of being an accessory to more than 3,500 murders.

title: At a Boarding School in Ukraine, Displaced Children Long for Home

title: At Least 49 Inmates Die in Riot at a Prison in Colombia
abstract: The director of the country’s national prisons system said that the inmates had set fire to some mattresses and produced an uncontrollable blaze.
